commit.message:
Move ChangeLog entries for config/ subdir into config/ChangeLog, where they belong.

Move ChangeLog entries for config/ subdir into config/ChangeLog, where
they belong.  Thanks to Kelley Cook <kcook34@ford.com>.

From-SVN: r72243
